description:
Master Van Darkholme establishes his hierarchy among the masters. He confronts Master Tober Brandt for stealing his untrained slave, chet. Master Van beats Master Tober into submission and gives him an ultimatum; either leave the House of Detention for good or endure the Fuck of Shame. Tober refuses to leave and receives a hard bondage gang-fuck by all the masters of the house. The bondage castle is united for the moment - but something's brewing in their midst...
Director's note: This update pays homage to my childhood. I was playing soldiers with my GI Joes and one day decided to play dungeon with them... and it went something like the first and second parts of this update. When Tober Brandt showed up on at the shoot with rainbow hair, my jaw dropped; I flashed back to a childhood moment of sugar-induced rush when I colored the head of my GI Joe with my magic markers.
title: Tober Gang Bang: Part Two
